title: Organizational Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Remote Collaborative Language Learning with Global Peers

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners collaborate on five or more partner-country assignments in a simulated environment
Learners engage in peer assessment activities three or more times using foreign language writing and voice feedback
Learners compose cross-cultural comparative analysis reports and share them at a VR presentation session

Learners write 15-minute daily reflection journals based on collaborative learning experiences for one week, elaborating on three specific items (role performance, team contribution, improvement points), and submit revised journals incorporating peer feedback once per week
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
